name: DEX remote captures per day
note: Zero Trust Free and Pay-as-you-go plans include predefined financial and identifier DLP profiles along with payload logging and false positive reporting.

name: Digital Experience Monitoring tests
note: Zero Trust Free and Pay-as-you-go plans include predefined financial and identifier DLP profiles along with payload logging and false positive reporting.

name: Database storage allotment
note: Free plan databases have smaller storage caps and shorter Time Travel retention compared to Workers Paid plans.

name: Included databases
note: Free plan databases have smaller storage caps and shorter Time Travel retention compared to Workers Paid plans.

name: Batch edit capacity
note: Zones created before 2024-09-01 keep a 1,000 record allowance on the Free plan unless upgraded.

name: Included DNS records for new zones
scope: Free zones created on or after 2024-09-01
note: Zones created before 2024-09-01 keep a 1,000 record allowance on the Free plan unless upgraded.

name: Durable Object classes
note: Workers Free plan access is limited to SQLite-backed Durable Objects with capped storage.

name: Durable Object storage allocation
note: Workers Free plan access is limited to SQLite-backed Durable Objects with capped storage.

name: Included unique transformations
note: Cached variants continue serving after the free quota is reached, but new transformations return error 9422 until you upgrade or the window resets.

name: Included reads
note: Exceeding free tier quotas returns errors for that operation type until the next UTC reset or a plan upgrade.

name: Included writes
note: Exceeding free tier quotas returns errors for that operation type until the next UTC reset or a plan upgrade.

name: IP Geolocation availability
note: IP Geolocation, IPv6 compatibility, and WebSockets are available across every Cloudflare plan tier.

name: Included custom domains
note: Exceeding build or domain limits requires upgrading to higher plans or requesting limit adjustments.

name: Included monthly builds
note: Exceeding build or domain limits requires upgrading to higher plans or requesting limit adjustments.

name: Class A operations
note: Free tier benefits apply only to Standard storage; Infrequent Access usage is billed separately.

name: Class B operations
note: Free tier benefits apply only to Standard storage; Infrequent Access usage is billed separately.

name: Egress bandwidth
note: Free tier benefits apply only to Standard storage; Infrequent Access usage is billed separately.

name: Storage allotment
note: Free tier benefits apply only to Standard storage; Infrequent Access usage is billed separately.

name: R2 SQL usage
value: No additional charges during open beta
note: Standard R2 storage and operations charges still apply to data that queries access.

name: Universal SSL coverage
value: Included certificates for all proxied hostnames
note: Universal SSL and minimum TLS controls are available on every Cloudflare plan, while advanced options require add-ons.

name: Managed ruleset access
note: Core WAF features, including custom rules and managed rules, are available across every plan with varying limits.

name: Requests
note: Free plan usage counts reset at midnight UTC and Workers automatically fail open or closed when the quota is exceeded.

name: Workflow state retention
note: Free plan executions share the Workers daily request quota; paid plans increase retention to 30 days.
